text: (And on the day when those who disbelieve) in Muhammad (pbuh) and the Qur'an (are exposed to the Fire) before they eventually enter it, ((they will be asked): Is not this) chastisement (real) just? (They will say: Yea, by our Lord) it is just. (He will say: Then taste the doom for that you disbelieved) in Muhammad (pbuh) and the Qur'an.
